name: Razor
desc: Mondstadt'ın Kurtlar Diyarı'nda, uygarlıktan uzakta, kurtlar arasında yaşayan bir çocuk. Şimşek gibi çevik.

desc.text: Picking up an Elemental Orb or Particle increases Razor's DMG by 10% for 8s.
Increases CRIT Rate against opponents with less than 30% HP by 10%.

Increases the Level of <color=#ffd780>Lightning Fang</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
When casting <color=#ffd780>Claw and Thunder</color> , opponents hit will have their DEF decreased by 15% for 7s.

Increases the Level of <color=#ffd780>Claw and Thunder</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

Every 10s, Razor's sword charges up, causing the next Normal Attack to release lightning that deals 100% of Razor's ATK as <color=#ffacff>Electro DMG</color> .
When Razor is not using <color=#ffd780>Lightning Fang</color> , a lightning strike on an opponent will grant Razor an Electro Sigil for <color=#ffd780>Claw and Thunder</color> .

imgDesc.text:
Original Outfit - Wild Sprint
Razor's outfit. Rough and ready clothes suited for running out in the wilderness.

desc.text:
Razor is a boy whose identity is shrouded in mystery. He lives in Wolvendom and is rarely spotted by the citizens of Mondstadt.
According to a handful of eyewitness accounts, Razor has keen senses and is highly agile, traversing the forest at breakneck speed. He is often seen in the company of his wolf pack, while generally avoiding contact with humans.
Some speculate that he was an orphan raised by the wolves, while others say he is a wolf spirit that has taken on a human form.
Such rumors only add to the mystery of the "Wolf Boy," as the denizens of Mondstadt call him.
Meanwhile, Razor the Wolf Boy stands all the while on the hilltops with his head held high, basking in the warm sunlight.

Razor lives among the wolves night and day.
All of them are as close with Razor as they could possibly be. Which wolf has the loudest howl, which wolf runs the fastest, which wolf is the best at ambushing — there isn't a wolf Razor doesn't know.
He can sense the mood of the wind, smell a scent from miles away, and knows many practical applications for plants of all kinds. The one thing he can't bring to mind is the faces of his parents.
What kind of people were they? No matter how hard he tries, he cannot remember.
His memory starts after his life with the wolves had already begun. The wolves took him in as part of their "Lupical" — a word he was taught by someone else, which means family.

Tiny singing things are flying in the sky.
The clouds are long and fluffy, like a wolf's tail.
Razor's world is a simple one.
On a sunny day, you run around hunting or try and beat your prey to the ripe fruits, on a rainy day, you hide out in a hollow tree and fall asleep hugging a furry lupine friend, with some grass and leaves for a pillow.
Eat as much as you can and drink plenty of water. Cool off in the lake when you're hot, and go find some juicy berries when you're thirsty.
Razor looks at his body and then at the bodies of his kin.
He knows he is different from them.
But there's nothing wrong with that, as far as Razor is concerned.

One day, a tall man came to the mountains and disrupted Razor's peaceful life.
Razor did not know who the man was, only that he was a human. Seeing the confused look on Razor's face, the man gave him a friendly smile.
"Hey buddy! Why don't you come back down to Mondstadt with me?"
The man offered his hand to Razor as he spoke.
But neither Razor nor the wolves understood the gesture. Feeling protective, the wolves placed themselves between Razor and the man to keep him away.
Razor ducked down beneath the wolves' furry tails. He looked at his body, and then peered out through the gaps in the wolf fur to get a look at the man's.
Razor knew he wasn't the most intelligent of beings, and was at a loss to answer the question that has been in his mind ever since that day.
"Am I a human, or a wolf?"

It was that man who gave Razor his name.
The simple Wolf Boy could not understand the intricacies of human language, but he knew from the look on the man's face when he produced this sound that the man was giving him a name.
"Rae-zer."
The shadows cast by the trees of Wolvendom grew short, and then grew long again.
The man taught Razor how to swing a sword. Unwieldy though this steel claw may be, thought Razor, it was at least sharp enough to cut through tree branches.
"Now you can protect your friends."
"Fr-ren-dzz..."
Razor imitated the sounds the man made, without understanding what they meant.
Similarly, he did not understand why the names of things were all that important in the first place. After all, he never learned the name of that man before he left.

"Master, what is... 'friends'?"
Razor once asked of his new mentor, working at the limits of his vocabulary.
His purple-clothed mentor seemed to know it all, from how to make hash browns from potatoes in the ground, to the name of the brightest star in the summer night sky.
However, Lisa simply smiled and yawned without answering him.
Razor thought about it when the wind blew, when the rain fell — even when Wolfhook berries got stuck in his fur. He just couldn't figure it out.
Until one day, Razor met a bright-red, 'burny' girl.
They stood in the wind together, got soaked in the rain together — she even rolled around in Wolfhook bushes with him.
Her name was Klee. When Razor played with her, it was like being a wolf pup again.
"Friends... is... Lupical."
Razor may not understand the complexity of human relationships, but he has an honest, primal loyalty to him.
"So... protect friends... Lupical... with life."
The wolf pack howls in the distance, summoning him home.
Razor still does not know if he is a human or a wolf.
But he is happy either way.

In a box so crudely made that one has to be extra careful when opening it lies Razor's greatest treasures.
The broken-off hilt of a greatsword, a children's storybook called The Wolf and the Windwheel Aster, and a dry, withered four-leaf clover.
Though he understands neither the intricacies of human relations nor the ways of the world, Razor knows that these are gifts from the ones known as 'friends' — and that is what makes them his most treasured possessions of all.

The story of how Razor got his Vision is one of the few memories that he wishes he could forget.
One day, during a lightning storm, an Abyss Mage ambushed Razor from behind and dragged him away. The wolf pack ran to his aid and put up a fearless fight, but every last one of them was defeated by the Abyss Mage.
As he looked on helplessly at his dear companions being harmed, Razor let out an almighty roar like that of a cornered animal.
"Lupical!"
Fueled by his almighty fury, a lightning-like power grew inside, and suddenly an overload of elemental energy was flowing within him.
He was ready to protect. He was ready to avenge.
He threw off his shackles and raised his weapon.
The Abyss Mage was overwhelmed and defeated by a wild, unfettered frenzy of Electro energy, but this time it was too late to save Razor's wolven companions.
...
Though he had obtained a Vision, Razor was still unable to manipulate Electro energy with finesse. One day many moons later, when he met the Witch of Purple Rose, Lisa, he began to study human knowledge.
"Friends, hurt... Never again! I will... protect them."
With each day, Razor grew more skilled in the use of his Vision. He made a silent promise to himself: "I will become stronger. I will become the strongest of them all."
Because the day may come when his Lupical faces another threat, and this time, he will protect them.

value.name: Sevimli Pati Mücveri
value.desc: Razor'ın özel tarifi. Kurt pençesine benzeyecek biçimde özenle şekillendirilmiş. Razor'ın insan yemeği yapmak için gösterdiği çabayı takdir etmemek elde değil.

desc.text:
Birthday, very different, compared to normal times.
With savory meat, and never-before tasted...pastries.
Spending it with you, very pleasant.
Twitter URL: https:/twitter.com/GenshinImpact/status/1303656899280343042

A lot of meat in the forest...
Surprise... for me?
Delicious, I like it, thank you!
Next time, together too. Promise.
Twitter URL: https:/twitter.com/GenshinImpact/status/1435815223877844995

"I like trees. Like running. Like you guys. Today... was fun. Thank you."
Twitter URL: https:/twitter.com/GenshinImpact/status/1435815225773592576

The sun, warm. Are you... looking for me?
Gifts are pretty, there's so many.
Like it a lot, thank you.
Happy... Let's hunt, together.
Twitter URL: https:/twitter.com/GenshinImpact/status/1568086795845357568

"The stars, pretty. Thanks, for being with me."
Twitter URL: https:/twitter.com/GenshinImpact/status/1568086920978210816

Message
"I came with a caravan. On our way to Mondstadt, something inexplicable happened!"
"I saw a strange boy when I was scouting. Initially, I believed him to be someone living in the area, but then I remembered that people weren't supposed to live there."
"It was a dangerous place called Wolvendom. Legends say that it has belonged to the wolves since ages ago. I tried to warn him, but he only overlooked me from the faraway mountains like a beast."
"When I recollected myself, the boy was gone... Come to think of it, it could have been just an illusion, but if he was an actual child from a local family... They should keep children away from dangerous places."
Cat's Tail's reply
We indeed have heared about these rumors. No matter. If you came with the merchant caravan, you are our guest, so why not come in and try Cat's Tail's famous wine?

<color=#ffd780>Normal Attack</color>
Perform up to 4 consecutive strikes.
<color=#ffd780>Charged Attack</color>
Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous spinning attacks against all nearby opponents.
At the end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash.
<color=#ffd780>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Genel para birimi. Herkesin anladığı dil.

materials.name: Direniş Öğretisi
materials.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Resistance is the backbone of the land of the wind.
The history of Mondstadt is one of resistances. People rose up to prevent past conflicts from ever being forgotten, like sprouts breaking through the soil, like the eternal wind eroding through stone walls.

materials.name: Kırık Maske
materials.desc:
A broken bone mask that once belonged to some hilichurl.
Now more broken than complete, it can no longer perform its primary function.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Genel para birimi. Herkesin anladığı dil.

materials.name: Direniş Rehberi
materials.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Resistance is the backbone of the city of Wind.
The history of Mondstadt is one of resistances. People rose up to grant the citizens of Mondstadt the freedom they now enjoy, like the Anemo Archon blowing away the snow, or like Vennessa rising up to fight.

materials.name: Lekeli Maske
materials.desc:
A bone mask, covered in unidentifiable stains, that emanates a mysterious odor.
Yet such is the devotion of hilichurls to masks that they will wear it nonetheless.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Genel para birimi. Herkesin anladığı dil.

materials.name: Direniş Felsefesi
materials.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Resistance is the backbone of the land of the wind.
The history of Mondstadt is one of resistances. People rose up to allow the future Mondstadt's poetry to freely be that of the wind and be spread across the land.

materials.name: Uğursuz Maske
materials.desc:
A glossy bone mask with oil markings painted on it, meant to intimidate enemies.
No one really knows why hilichurls are so fascinated with masks. Some say that it's because they don't want to see their own reflections in the water.

materials.name: Dvalin'in Pençesi
materials.desc:
A claw from the Dragon of the East.
It once contained the shadow dragon Durin's vile poison, having torn through the latter's flesh in battle. Thanks to your purification and healing, it is no longer toxic.

materials.name: Bilgelik Tacı
materials.desc:
A precious Talent Level-Up material.
Once a medium for the storage and transfer of wisdom in ancient times. Now, wisdom is found in ancient texts and in profound speech. Nevertheless, this Crown of Insight must still be able to impart some transcendent power and wisdom to its bearer.

desc.text:
Hunts his prey using the techniques taught to him by his master and his lupical.
<color=#ffd780>Tap/Press</color>
Swings the Thunder Wolf Claw, dealing <color=#ffacff>Electro DMG</color> to opponents in front of Razor.
Upon striking an opponent, Razor will gain an Electro Sigil, which increases his Energy Recharge rate.
Razor can have up to 3 Electro Sigils simultaneously, and gaining a new Electro Sigil refreshes their duration.
<color=#ffd780>Hold</color>
Gathers Electro energy to unleash a lightning storm over a small AoE, causing massive <color=#ffacff>Electro DMG</color> , and clears all of Razor's Electro Sigils.
Each Electro Sigil cleared in this manner will be converted into Energy for Razor.
In the moment when lightning strikes, you can sometimes glimpse the look of a predator sizing up his prey deep within Razor's eyes.

Summons the Wolf Within, which deals <color=#ffacff>Electro DMG</color> to all nearby opponents. This clears all of Razor's Electro Sigils, which will be converted into Elemental Energy for him.
The Wolf Within will fight alongside Razor for the skill's duration.
<color=#ffd780>The Wolf Within</color>
· Strikes alongside Razor's normal attacks, dealing <color=#ffacff>Electro DMG</color> .
· Raises Razor's ATK SPD and <color=#ffacff>Electro RES</color> .
· Causes Razor to be immune to DMG inflicted by the <color=#ffacff>Electro-Charged</color> status.
· Disables Razor's Charged Attacks.
· Increases Razor's resistance to interruption.
These effects end when Razor leaves the battlefield.
When Razor leaves the field, a maximum of 10 Energy will be returned to him based off the duration remaining on this skill.
The wolf has awoken. The hunt is on.

Decreases <color=#ffd780>Claw and Thunder</color> 's CD by 18%.
Using <color=#ffd780>Lightning Fang</color> resets the CD of <color=#ffd780>Claw and Thunder</color> .
When Razor's Energy is below 50%, increases Energy Recharge by 30%.

Decreases sprinting Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

materials.desc: Genel para birimi. Herkesin anladığı dil.

materials.name: Vajrada Ametisti Tozu
materials.desc: Character Ascension Material.

materials.name: Kurt Çengeli
materials.desc: A berry with thorns that often gets attached to a wolf's pelt. When you look at it, you can almost hear the echoing cries of the wolves in the woods.

materials.name: Kırık Maske
materials.desc:
A broken bone mask that once belonged to some hilichurl.
Now more broken than complete, it can no longer perform its primary function.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Genel para birimi. Herkesin anladığı dil.

materials.name: Vajrada Ametisti Kırıntısı
materials.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"This body is the noblest and most eminent of all in this world."

materials.name: Şimşek Prizması
materials.desc:
An Electro Hypostasis channels nearby elemental energy to repair damaged elemental entities. Contains the essence of Electro energy.
An ordinary prism separates white light into its component colors; a Lightning Prism, however, channels flowing energies and weaves them into lightning. It will continue to do so even after the Electro Hypostasis has been defeated.

Character Ascension material.

voice.title: Hello
voice.desc: You smell... *sniff* nice! Let's hunt.

voice.title: Chat: Scent
voice.desc: *sniff* I smell rabbit.

voice.title: Chat: Hunger
voice.desc: I'm hungry. Let's hunt.

voice.title: Chat: Wind-gazing
voice.desc: I keep watch. You leave, you call me.

voice.title: When Thunder Strikes: Warning
voice.desc: If you're scared of lightning, hide now.

voice.title: When Thunder Strikes: Guidance
voice.desc: Avoid the trees. Follow me.

voice.title: When It's Windy
voice.desc: Wind... I like the wind.

voice.title: When the Wind Is Blowing
voice.desc: The wind... bites hard.

voice.title: Good Morning
voice.desc: The sun is up. Time to hunt.

voice.title: Good Afternoon
voice.desc: I had a big lunch. Lots of meat. Mm, I'm happy.

voice.title: Good Evening
voice.desc: Go to sleep. I watch the moon.

voice.title: Good Night
voice.desc: You sleep now. I keep watch.

voice.title: About Razor
voice.desc: I have no human family. I am a wolf.

voice.title: About Us: Friends
voice.desc: You are my friend. We can hunt. Together!

voice.title: About Us: Weapons
voice.desc: I have iron claws and teeth of thunder. I protect you.

voice.title: About the Vision
voice.desc: Vision helps Razor... fight with lightning tooth! Protect Lupical!

voice.title: Something to Share
voice.desc: I like the stars at night. So many stars. In the sky, in the lake. And in the city.

voice.title: Interesting Things
voice.desc: The wolves are my Lupical. My family.

voice.title: About Lisa
voice.desc: Lisa lightning makes the sky black. She is strong. She is scary.

voice.title: About Barbara
voice.desc: Shining Barbara is a good child. Very good child.

voice.title: About Diluc
voice.desc: Diluc is red and black. Hot and cold.

voice.title: About Venti
voice.desc: Razor doesn't know poems, but... Lupical likes them.

voice.title: About Bennett
voice.desc: Bennett... Much talking. Eat with him, never full.

voice.title: About Klee
voice.desc: Klee, friend! Friend, but... big hassle.

voice.title: About Varka: Stranger
voice.desc: Varka? Razor doesn't know...

voice.title: About Varka: Memory
voice.desc: Oh, Varka is... a name. That man big. Big steelclaw, Razor's name — Varka gave him. Oh... want to see him.

voice.title: More About Razor: I
voice.desc: *sniff* Hmm... You smell kind. Do you like meat?

voice.title: More About Razor: II
voice.desc: You are strong. Like a wolf. I like to hunt with you. We catch a lot.

voice.title: More About Razor: III
voice.desc: Lupical means wolf home— no, Lupical means wolf family. My Lupical lives in the woods. They say I am their Lupical.

voice.title: More About Razor: IV
voice.desc: My Lupical is my only family. But I don't have four legs, not like them. Because I'm not a real wolf. Sometimes, this makes me sad.

voice.title: More About Razor: V
voice.desc: When I run with you, when I hunt with you, I am happy. With you, I am not a wolf, I am not a boy, I am just me. I am Razor. Because you are my friend. You are my Lupical. I hope you feel happy, too!

voice.title: Razor's Hobbies
voice.desc: I like Lupical. I like the woods. I like my friend. I like to run!

voice.title: Razor's Troubles
voice.desc: Talking makes me tired. Talking is... hard. But... I have to try.

voice.title: Favorite Food
voice.desc: I like meat, and... I like potatoes.

voice.title: Least Favorite Food
voice.desc: Greens are bad. Animal eats green things. Then I eat animal!

voice.title: Birthday
voice.desc: Today is your day. You were born on this day, many moons ago. I want to make you happy today. Can we eat meat together?

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Intro
voice.desc: Arms... bigger!

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Building Up
voice.desc: Grr! Sharpen claws. Sharpen teeth. Become stronger!

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Climax
voice.desc: Run... Hunt... No. No! Must... become stronger!

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion
voice.desc: Teeth. Claws. Legs. All bigger. All stronger! To protect you.

voice.title: Elemental Skill: I
voice.desc: Get back!

voice.title: Elemental Skill: II
voice.desc: Ah!

voice.title: Elemental Skill: III
voice.desc: Heyah!

voice.title: Elemental Skill: IV
voice.desc: Keep back!

voice.title: Elemental Burst: I
voice.desc: Raaaarrr!

voice.title: Elemental Burst: II
voice.desc: *howls*

voice.title: Elemental Burst: III
voice.desc: *roars*

voice.title: Elemental Burst: IV
voice.desc: Rar!

voice.title: Opening Treasure Chest: I
voice.desc: These things... useful?

voice.title: Opening Treasure Chest: II
voice.desc: Empty chest... good for storage.

voice.title: Opening Treasure Chest: III
voice.desc: Smell of treasure... strange.

voice.title: Low HP: I
voice.desc: Argh!

voice.title: Low HP: II
voice.desc: *grunt* A-a-awoooo!

voice.title: Low HP: III
voice.desc: I kill you!

voice.title: Fallen: I
voice.desc: Can't... breathe...

voice.title: Fallen: II
voice.desc: Take me back...

voice.title: Fallen: III
voice.desc: Lupical... my Lupical...

voice.title: Heavy Hit Taken: I
voice.desc: I taste blood...

voice.title: Joining Party: I
voice.desc: I'll scout ahead.

voice.title: Joining Party: II
voice.desc: We're going to hunt!

voice.title: Joining Party: III
voice.desc: I'll watch your back.

voice.title: Receiving a Gift: I
voice.desc: Smells good, also tastes good, I like it.

voice.title: Receiving a Gift: II
voice.desc: Eating this gives me energy, makes me happy.

voice.title: Receiving a Gift: III
voice.desc: Eating it, bad. Not eating it, also bad. I'm a bit sad.

voice.title: Ally at Low HP: I
voice.desc: No!

voice.title: Ally at Low HP: II
voice.desc: Wake up!
